nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.validation
Class Validator

java.lang.Object
  nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.validation.Validator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DelegatingValidator
public class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class has the information needed to validate an object. Common validation rules, like required and length constraints are handled out of the box. Other validations should be done with an external implementation of the Validation interface. When the constructor with a baseName is called, properties will have a default key "baseName.propertyName"

Author:
luis
